name: Wheat Warrior (dragon warrior parady )
description:
The wheat kingdom has been taken over by the soda king save the people trapped under his tyrannical rule find the great spoon and take him down.

  

Movement keys

W - UP 

A = LEFT 

S - DOWN 

D- RIGHT 

Arrow Keys — Move/Look

Z/X — Interact 

How To Play 
move around and interact with charters in the area until you find the objectives and complete the task required to beat the game. there's also a speed run challenge at the end for those who are up to the challenge. avoid many traps and tricks and prove yourself to worthy of the H&H title as the wheat warrior! Credits For H&H Cereal 
Kyle Trenor  — Developer
Kyle Trenor  — Sound Effects and Music
